subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Baseball (College)
lead_paragraph: In mid-May, Dr. James Andrews performed Tommy John surgery on Jeff Hoffman, a junior right-hander at East Carolina, to repair the torn ulnar collateral ligament.
snippet: In mid-May, Dr. James Andrews performed Tommy John surgery on Jeff Hoffman, a junior right-hander at East Carolina, to repair the torn ulnar collateral ligament.
